and matrix of 0s & 1s which defines the ee.

 class FCompareDistances
          Calculates the distances of the input directory with the image BD, Different distances are used like L1 norm, L2 norm, Kullback-Leibler divergence and Jeffrey divergence and different values like number of bins to compare the results.

          Adjusts the contrast in an input image.
